entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

urls.title: WWT responds to Environment Agency’s warning that reaching net zero ‘not enough to save our planet’
urls.description: Environment Agency Chief Executive Sir James Bevan warned government and business on Tuesday (16 March) that we need climate adaptation measures as well as net zero ambitions, describing them as “two sides of the same coin”.

text:
The @EnvAgency says: 📢 #NetZero is not enough to save the planet; climate adaption measures are vital too.

We say: 📢 Wetlands are the answer!

Our #BlueRecovery plan to create and restore 100k hectares of wetlands will help the UK adapt and thrive > https://t.co/VtC4Cmgvvh https://t.co/4GgVoODeu0

@gedbird @FyldeBeachCare @unitedutilities @LOVEmyBEACH_NW @LoveMyBeachMBP @KeepBritainTidy @_MBay @EnvAgency @ConnectRightUK @DouglasPilot @RibbleLife That's what I thought, but when I queried about getting the soil pipe moved I was told I'd need to get all waste water pipes relocated to flow into that soil pipe. Having them run into the same grid as the roof gutters is wrong, despite it all flowing to the sewer
